root.name: JESUS
root.description: JESUS is a visual novel adventure game originally released for the NEC PC-88 computer. It has become a cult classic amongst many retro gamers, largely due to the game's eye-catching title.The 1989 Famicom version JESUS: Kyoufu no Bio Monster, ported by Chunsoft and published by King Records, had an English fan translation released in 2006. Though the Famicom version had a lower resolution than the PC-88 original, the Famicom port is the best known version to Western gamers.
